thread.title: Dolly Varden Silver Seeks NYSE American Listing and Announces Share Consolidation
thread.title_full: Dolly Varden Silver Seeks NYSE American Listing and Announces Share Consolidation

author: /news/author/tiprankscanadiannewsdesk
title: Dolly Varden Silver Seeks NYSE American Listing and Announces Share Consolidation
text:
The latest update is out from Dolly Varden Silver ( (TSE:DV) ).
Dolly Varden Silver Corporation has applied to list its common shares on the NYSE American, aiming to enhance access to larger equity markets and attract American investors. In preparation for this listing, the company will consolidate its shares, reducing the number of outstanding shares significantly, which is expected to provide better value for shareholders and improve marketability.
More about Dolly Varden Silver
Dolly Varden Silver Corporation is a mineral exploration company focused on advancing its 100% held Kitsault Valley Project, which combines the Dolly Varden Project and the Homestake Ridge Project, located in the Golden Triangle of British Columbia, Canada. The project hosts high-grade silver and gold resources and includes the past producing Dolly Varden and Torbrit silver mines.
YTD Price Performance: 2.08%
Average Trading Volume: 291,784
Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell
Current Market Cap: C$329.9M
